title: Ed Sheeran reveals why Taylor Swift's music never gets leaked : Music, News - India Today
text:
Music Ed Sheeran reveals why Taylor Swift's music never gets leaked 
Musician and Taylor Swift's best friend, Ed Sheeran has uncovered the secret behind Taylor Swift's efficiency in keeping her music under wraps till its final release. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit 
Despite dropping enough hints about her songs, specially near their release, Taylor Swift always manages to maintain their sanctity till the final release date. 
In today's digital age, where piracy is commonplace, Tay Tay scores a full ten in making sure her music never leaks, and the secret behind it? Well, a locked suitcase--or so says Ed Sheeran. A photo posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Jul 4, 2015 at 11:20am PDT 
In a recent interview with Brazilian website Capricho, Sheeran revealed that Swift "would never send new songs, no" and that he gets to "hear them but it has to be with her." 
Also Read: How did a pizza-beer diet make singer Ed Sheeran lose 20 kg? 
Speaking about how he first heard their collaborative track, Everything Has Changed, Sheeran said: 
"I was in San Francisco, and they sent someone with a locked briefcase with an iPad and one song on it, and they flew to San Francisco, and played the song I've done with her," Cosmopolitan quotes him as saying. 
After he gave the song his nod, "they took it back, that's how I hear it," said Sheeran. 
Wow, that's some way to protect one's art, isn't it? To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
